description:
Everyday thousands of people forget where they spent their money and admit they have no money discipline. They feel like they are on a financial roller coaster. "I need to get control of my money." Does this sound familiar? You are not alone.

Here's what students are saying about the course:

"Erika does a great job explaining a very dry topic." Devin C.

"The course is clear and organized very well. It doesn't get much better for the price in my opinion." Greg V.

This course will help you:

  • Save thousands per year on fees and excess spending
  • Improve your credit rating
  • Know when you are over/under budget
  • Customize bill payments by pay periods
  • Know exactly how much money is left pay to pay

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to: Use a Customizable Excel Worksheet for your Monthly Budget

Instructor E.B. Joseph is going to show you step by step how to setup a monthly budget and organize your financial life. She covers projected and actual income and projected and actual expenses in order to have a detailed picture of where your money is going. This class is geared for older and young adults.

She believes in the acronym KISS: Keep It Short & Simple. She knows from personal experience keeping things simple when it relates to money works. This class is a perfect fit for people who do not want to have a budget app on their smart phone that is linked to their bank accounts but yet want a system that helps them be proactive and stay organized. She demonstrates how to customize an ordinary Excel document into a powerful tool to help you win with money.

Enroll Today! KISS!

Course updated on: May 2016
title: Excel Budget: Customize Your Personal Worksheet
